content: this is a free pattern for the adorable avocado food friends it s also quick and easy if you re a beginner crocheter it s a must try pattern you will receive this exclusive pattern when you **sign up for my newsletter ** then you ll be asked to confirm your email and tada you will be sent an adorable free pdf pattern and we ll stay in touch about all future free patterns that come out i wanted to send a nice gift to anyone who signs up so i hope you like it heart_suit supplies for this pattern 4mm hook 3mm safety eyes/beads tapestry needle stuffing scissors yarn used brown light yellow and bright green specifically i used big twist value solids in colors chocolate cream and lime each avocado is 3 5 or 9 cm height by 2 5 or 5 5cm length i hope you enjoy this pattern and please feel free to contact me if you need help
